body_html:
Is there a reason why install calls build_deps, and develop doesn't? develop will only call build_ext. On a superficial look this seems to be why python setup.py develop fails.

If you don't remember why it is the way it is, I can try and change it. python setup.py develop is the standard way, and if this works, it also works with pip install --editable.
body_text:
Is there a reason why install calls build_deps, and develop doesn't? develop will only call build_ext. On a superficial look this seems to be why python setup.py develop fails.
If you don't remember why it is the way it is, I can try and change it. python setup.py develop is the standard way, and if this works, it also works with pip install --editable.
body:
Is there a reason why [`install` calls `build_deps`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/bbe6ef3/setup.py#L744-L745), and [`develop` doesn't](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/bbe6ef3/setup.py#L535-L540)? `develop` will [only call `build_ext`](https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/blob/master/setuptools/command/develop.py#L133-L138). On a superficial look this seems to be why `python setup.py develop` fails.

If you don't remember why it is the way it is, I can try and change it. `python setup.py develop` is the standard way, and if this works, it also works with `pip install --editable`.
